description: Pope Francis, taking questions after his papal visit to Ireland, urged parents not to ignore their gay children or throw them out of the family.
title: Pope Francis on Gay Children: ‘Don’t Condemn, Have a Dialogue’
title_page: Pope Francis on Gay Children: ‘Don’t Condemn, Have a Dialogue’ - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Pope Francis, taking questions after his papal visit to Ireland, urged parents not to ignore their gay children or throw them out of the family.
